players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Be careful, Charlie. Your silence might be telling."
Charlie: "I'm still keeping silent. I don't want to give away any information about myself or others."
Diana: "I found out that Alice is the mafioso. Keep an eye on Charlie, as his silence could be suspicious."
